titles.title: A resolution congratulating Miss Emma Broyles of Alaska for being crowned Miss America 2022.
A resolution congratulating Miss Emma Broyles of Alaska for being crowned Miss America 2022.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
This resolution congratulates Emma Broyles of Alaska for being crowned Miss America 2022.
The resolution also celebrates the historic achievement of Emma Broyles as the first Alaskan and first Korean-American to be crowned Miss America.
